definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: There is an acrid tone to your remarks.
sentences.chinese: 你說這些話的口氣帶有譏刺意味。

sentences.english: His works were known to be satiric due to his satirical personality.
sentences.chinese: 由於好譏刺的個性，他的作品多以諷刺爲主。

sentences.english: You have made us a reproach to our neighbors, the scorn and derision of those around us.
sentences.chinese: 你使我們受鄰國的羞辱，被四圍的人嗤笑譏刺。
